activities: Evernote Corporation receives personal information regarding natural persons located in the EEA and/or Switzerland in connection with activities such as (1) user registration and use of the service, (2) providing support to registered users of the service, (3) human resources data, (4) fraud detection and systems management, and (5) compliance with governmental, legislative, and regulatory bodies.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line data.  Human resources data. Vendor data.
recoursemech:
Contact by email listed in the bottom of the privacy policy: compliance@evernote.com
EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for dispute resolution
